docs.text: Welcome the Cppm Welcome to the Cppm Documentation Cppm is a program that manages the C/C++ Cmake project using cppm.toml. Cmake is complex and difficult for beginners to use. So I wrapped Cmake once more to make it easier to use as Rust Cargo. Because I created it with reference to Cargo, the general configuration file is similar to Cargo.toml. Cppm works only with Cmake, so you can build with Cmake. Cppkg is the dependency manager for Cppm. Since cppkg uses Cmake's Exteranl_Porject_Add , it supports cross-platfrom install. Cppm supports Hunter Package manager. So cppm dependency can be either hunter or cppkg. Commands cppm run {options} {commands} cppm init {options} {commands} cppm cppkg {options} {commands} cppm build {options} {commands} cppm config {options} {commands} cppm update {options} {commands} Project layout cppm.toml # Cppm configuration file. Generate CMakeLists.txt build/ # build directory cmake/ # cmake files Modules/ # Find cmake files cppm_tool.cmake # cppm cmake tools HunterGate.cmake # Hunter package manager cmake tools include/ # include directory src/ # source directory thirdparty/ # cppkg script install path
